name: Kreatik
description:
Our mission at Kreatik is to create marketing that sells. We combine strong strategic mindset with creative branding and build the best user experience of your marketing communication.
 
At Kreatik, we build websites and applications, do UX/UI design and research, create beautiful and convincing video explainers. We carefully measure key results of our products and campaigns.
 
Our  team of over 20 people includes Developers, Project Managers, UX Designers, Graphic Designers, Motion Designers and Marketing Strategists.
In over 5 years of operation, Kreatik has delivered more than 140 projects for various companies – from small startups to top companies. Our team members love working with challenging ideas within web&mobile ecosystem.
